Complete Weather Monitoring Solution

We have the solution to your precision needs. Our systems offer real-time data, available to the collecting site in addition to expanding your network through real-time online monitoring.

The Omenium OmniSkyOne is a rugged system designed for continuous 24/7 operations. Built around a heavy duty computer to follow you where ever you need to go.

More Info

The Omenium OmniSkyWX is a cost effective solution that offers great quality and functionality, designed for the industrial environment.
